title: Bachelor bombshell Jessica Brody shows off her plump pout
text:
She's the former Bachelor star who isn't afraid to flaunt her incredible tattoos and fit physique.

But on Saturday, Jessica Brody surprised her thousands of followers by showing off a much plumper pout than usual in a video shared to social media.

Taking to Instagram, the 31-year-old bombshell shared a video flaunting her very plump lips.

Bigger the better? Former Bachelor star Jessica Brody debuted a much plumper pout on Instagram over the weekend

In the post, Jessica initially leans her chin on her hand before looking directly at the camera and pouting.

The makeup artist and model wears a black jumper while her brunette locks are tied into a high ponytail.

Jessica also shows off her natural beauty in the video which uses a boomerang filter, opting to wear minimal make-up.

Pout: Jessica shared a video to Instagram flaunting her plump lips and showing off her natural beauty

Also visible in the short video is her dog, who can be seen lying down on the lounge in the background.

Her post comes on month after she publicly came out as bisexual, during a Q&A with her fans on Instagram.

When asked if she'd ever date another woman, Jessica said: 'If I met someone that I liked then that's someone I like... I have no preference with gender.'

She continued: 'Whoever I like I like. I've dated both men and women before.'

Revelation: Jessica's post comes on month after she publicly came out as bisexual, during a Q&A on Instagram

Jessica rose to fame after making a short yet memorable appearance on the last season of The Bachelor.

Unfortunately, she failed to find love with suitor Matt Agnew and exited the show after just two episodes.

Since her departure, Jessica has continued to make headlines after revealing that she previously enjoyed a romantic tryst with The Project's Tommy Little.
description: She's the former Bachelor star who isn't afraid to flaunt her incredible tattoos and fit physique.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
